alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 05 at 7:10PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Avalanche Warning * WHERE... Flat Tops, Elk Head Mountains, Park Range, Gore Range, and Northern Front Range, Medicine Bow, and Never Summer Mountains * WHEN... Very dangerous avalanche conditions lasting through Tuesday evening December 6. * IMPACTS...You can expect to easily trigger a large and dangerous avalanche on steep northerly and easterly-facing slopes at all elevations. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Travel in backcountry avalanche terrain is not recommended on Tuesday. Stay up-to-date with changing conditions at colorado.gov/avalanche. Cooperstein

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet; West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
